metadata.title: CVE-2019-18886 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Symfony 4.2.0 to 4.2.11 and 4.3.0 to 4.3.7. Theability to enumerate users was possible due to different handling dependingon whether the user existed when making unauthorized attempts to use theswitch users functionality. This is related to symfony/security.

criterions.comment: symfony: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
